name: Unreal Airline
description:
FYI: The game is a little bit overwhelming, especially for new players. The gameplay video of my friend shows that LOL

Hello and welcome to your brand new opened airport, called "Unreal Airlines"! Make sure to check everyone's passports before letting them onboard, just in case they have a fake passport. Hah! As if that'll ever happen!

Unreal Airlines is a game where you have to check people's passports to see if they're real or not  (Which is the theme :p) . It's similar to Papers Please, but is more fast-paced and chaotic. Plus, after a few waves, you'll unlock challenges, which you can see by pressing "W" on your keyboard. They don't add much, they just make a nice little challenge.
